content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x1)

### Coal Mine at position(y)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position y1)

### Iron Plate Factory at position(z)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position z1) that requires iron-plate to craft iron-gear-wheel
- Assembling machine (position z2) that requires iron-plate to craft iron-stick

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items due to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure you have enough required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, you need iron-plates to craft iron-gear-wheels.

### Errors when extracting from furnaces
- Make sure the furnace has items to extract before attempting to extract them. If the furnace is empty, the extraction will fail.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing. This includes checking if the tile is already occupied by another entity.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.
